author: mmusich
body:
backport of https://github.com/cms-sw/cmssw/pull/38378 and https://github.com/cms-sw/cmssw/pull/38463

#### PR description:

PR  https://github.com/cms-sw/cmssw/pull/33770 added a new ALCARECO producer (`ALCARECOTkAlDiMuonAndVertex`).
This PR adds the DQM monitoring for that stream and adds a new DQM Analyzer (`DiMuonVertexMonitor`)  to monitor the properties of the selected di-muon vertices.
I profit of this PR to make a clean-up of the `TkAlCaRecoMonitor` module as well in commit  2931aac8b3abf332dae02a7b64924e7789bf837f.

#### PR validation:

Run successfully a modified version of 136.887 to include the `TkAlDiMuonAndVertex` ALCARECO producer.

#### if this PR is a backport please specify the original PR and why you need to backport that PR:

almost verbatim backport of https://github.com/cms-sw/cmssw/pull/38378 + https://github.com/cms-sw/cmssw/pull/38463 (needed to change GT and input files in the unit tests).
I am opening since there is a window for a new release to be used at Tier-0 - no big hopes of getting it in, though.
title: [12.3.X] Add `DiMuonVertexMonitor` module and use it for `ALCARECOTkAlDiMuonAndVertexDQM`
